title.rendered: The Ideal Length of Everything You Write Online ( Infographic)

content.rendered: Want maximum reach, likes, and shares, but don’t know how long your content should be? Discover the ideal length for everything you write online:

excerpt.rendered: Text length has a huge influence on performance of your content. If there are limits, you need to be efficient. If not, you are free to write as much as you want, but in most cases, less is more. Here’s some best practice advice, backed by research.
